StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCollegePro.leBySchoolRowGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT [CollegePro.leID], hs.[SCHOOL_CODE] AS SchoolCode, hs.highschool_name AS CollegeName, [FiscalYear] AS FiscalYear, [BarronsIndex],[PriorityCode], [NumMale],[NumFemale],[NumAfricanAmerican], [NumHispanic],[NumOther],[NumQCPMale],[NumQCPFemale], [NumQCPAfricanAmerican],[NumQCPHispanic], [NumQCPOther],[AvgAVT], [AvgSAT] ,[InStateCost],[OutOfStateCost],[DistanceToCollege], [TimeToCollegeInMinutes],[SizeOfFreshmanClass], [PercentLivingOnCampus],[PercentGradua.on]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] cp RIGHT OUTER JOIN [dbo].High_School hs ON cp.school_code = hs.school_code and cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear and hs.school_type <> 'HS'
WHERE hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode ORDER BY hs.[SCHOOL_CODE]
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
